philaunch_gui_vscode_tasks.description: Tasks for VS Code Claude to handle - refinements, optimizations, and polish

tasks.title: Add tooltips to all buttons
tasks.description: Add QToolTip to all QPushButton instances with helpful descriptions of what each button does

tasks.title: Add keyboard shortcuts
tasks.description: Implement QShortcut for common operations (Ctrl+R refresh, Ctrl+T terminal, Ctrl+Q quit, etc.)
tasks.lines: Add in __init__ method after UI setup

tasks.title: Optimize system status polling
tasks.description: Refactor _fetch_system_status() to cache results and only update changed values

tasks.title: Add output text limit to prevent memory bloat
tasks.description: Limit output_text QTextEdit to last 1000 lines, auto-trim older content

tasks.title: Add script editor integration
tasks.description: Double-click on script opens it in default editor (nano/vim/code)
tasks.lines: Add itemDoubleClicked signal handler to tree widget

tasks.title: Add favorites/starred scripts
tasks.description: Right-click context menu to star frequently used scripts, separate tree section
tasks.lines: Add context menu to tree widget and favorites storage

tasks.title: Add task history log
tasks.description: Track all executed scripts with timestamp, exit code, duration - display in dedicated tab
tasks.lines: Add QTabWidget to middle pane, create history tracking

tasks.title: Add comprehensive error handling
tasks.description: Wrap all subprocess calls in try-except with user-friendly error messages and recovery suggestions

tasks.title: Add input validation
tasks.description: Validate script paths exist before execution, check tmux is installed, etc.
tasks.lines: Add validation methods and call before actions

tasks.title: Add smooth hover animations
tasks.description: Use QPropertyAnimation for smooth color transitions on button hovers
tasks.lines: Refactor button stylesheets to support animations

tasks.title: Add custom scrollbar styling
tasks.description: Style QScrollBar for all scroll areas to match theme (green handle, dark track)
tasks.lines: Add to stylesheet in setup_ui or widget creation

tasks.title: Add settings/config file support
tasks.description: Save window size, splitter positions, refresh interval to ~/.philaunch_config.json

tasks.title: Add theme switcher
tasks.description: Allow switching between Matrix (green), Cyberpunk (cyan), Fire (orange) themes
tasks.lines: Create multiple color palettes and theme switching mechanism

tasks.title: Add comprehensive docstrings
tasks.description: Add detailed docstrings to all methods following Google style guide

tasks.title: Add inline comments for complex logic
tasks.description: Explain threading logic, signal/slot connections, and subprocess handling

tasks.title: Extract reusable widget classes
tasks.description: Create StatusIndicator, ActionButton, ScriptTreeItem classes for better organization

tasks.title: Separate business logic from UI
tasks.description: Create PhiLaunchController class for automation logic, keep UI class for presentation only

tasks.title: Add unit tests for automation logic
tasks.description: Test script loading, task management, subprocess handling with mocks

instructions_for_vscode_claude.workflow: Load this divert.json file and work through tasks one at a time
do_not_touch: Color constants in philaunch_colors.py unless theme switcher task
instructions_for_vscode_claude.communication: After completing each task, update this JSON with 'status': 'completed' and add 'completed_by' field
instructions_for_vscode_claude.testing: Test each change by running ./launch-gui.sh to ensure no breakage

notes.purpose: Divide GUI refinement work between Claude Code (structure) and VS Code Claude (polish)
notes.philosophy: Claude Code builds the foundation, VS Code Claude adds the polish
